verses.text: Ix tak'wixi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Ayxo scajwi in te ab'an juntzanh lolonel tzeyalub'tanhej tik. Tzeyak'och he b'a eyak'an sniwanil in k'ool, palta anhej yaelal tze wach' ik'ejcot t'a wib'anh.
¿Tom malaj slajwub' juntzanh he lolonel malaj yelk'och tik? ¿Tas eyaji yuj chi' anhej wal ha' he pacan t'ayin?
Q'uinaloc a ex tik icha wal waj tik eyaji, max am wal-laj icha tzeyutej eyalan tik t'ayin, max am in tzicub'tanhej in sat walan jantac lolonel t'ayex.
Palta jun, a am lolonel wach' syak' sniwanil he k'ool, syak' he tek'anil, a am swal t'ayex.
Manh yujoc to tzin loloni, tz'och waan in yaelal tik, manh yujoc pax to tzin em numan tz'ochpax waan.
Ha Dios tz'ak'an lajwoquel wip. Ha pax tz'ik'anel heb' wamigo t'ayin.
Ichato preso waj yuj. Jantac tas syik'chaanh heb' anima t'a in patic, jantac es lolonel syik'cot heb' t'a wib'anh.
Ha Dios tzak'anoch wuuj yic tzin sataneli, icha junok nok' chium nok'. Ay wal och sat t'ayin, icha wal to wajk'ool yaji.
Jantac heb' anima smolb'ej sb'a yic tzin sb'uchan heb'. Stz'itanb'at in sat heb', emnaquil tzin yutejcan heb'.
Ha Dios ix in ak'anoch t'a yol sk'ab' juntzanh anima te chuk spensar.
Junk'olal wajeq'ui, ix in swecchitani. Ix och yub'naj t'a in jaj, chok' ix in yutej, ix in yak'anoch t'a sat sjul-lab'.
Yalnhej b'aj sjawi sjul-lab' chi' t'ayin, ichato sk'axpaj t'a in niwanil tik, manhxa jab'oc sniwank'olal t'ayin. Toxonhej spuccanb'at yol in k'ol t'a sat lu'um.
Jantac in aj in lajwi yuj. Scot wal t'ayin icha junok soldado te tek'an.
Te cusk'olal waji, ayoch pichul ya swa wuuj, manhxa jab'oc wopisio.
Ste mal in sat woq'ui, sq'uik'b'i k 'inal swila'.
Icha chi' waji, wach'chom malaj mach b'aj ix och in mul, wach'nhej in lesal.
Mocab' k'ub'chajel jantac chukal ix ak'jioch t'a wib'anh. Ab'chajocab'i ayic tzin tewi yic tzin k'anan tojolal.
Ay jun ayoch in testigooc ayek' t'a satcha’anh, ha' ol och wed'oc.
Ha heb' wamigo tonhej tzin sb'uch heb', a inxo tik tzin ok'nhej t'a yichanh Dios.
Ayoc wal junok mach tz'alan d'ha Dios wuuj, icha syutej junok mach scolan junok yetanimail.
Jayexonhej ab'il ayin eq'ui, haxo in b'at t'a chamel chi' b'aj maxtzac yal ko paxta.
